wmndsDetailsProps.name: headingText
wmndsDetailsProps.description: Required. Text content for heading line. If headingHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

wmndsDetailsProps.name: contentText
wmndsDetailsProps.description: Required. The text content of each section, which is hidden when the section is closed. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

wmndsDetailsProps.name: contentHTML
wmndsDetailsProps.description: Required. The HTML content of each section, which is hidden when the section is closed.

wmndsDetailsProps.name: isOpen
wmndsDetailsProps.description: If true, details will be expanded upon initial load. Defaults to false.
